label: 阿弥陀
対訳語: Buddha of the Western Paradise.  Amitābha in Sanskrit.
本: Early Japanese History c. 40 B.C.-A.D. 1167,  Part B . Princeton University Press . 1937
説明文: A Buddha, being The Buddha of the Western Paradise, in whom those wishing to be born there believe. The central figure of the Amida-no-sanzon. [阿弥陀三尊]
